description: a serpentine timeline. The serpentine shape can be an option for instances where an oblong canvas is not ideal. The shape can be customized using many of the signals below. Input bindings have been included for demonstration purposes

signals.name: sH
signals.description: serpentine: diameter of arcs

signals.name: labelsOnHover
signals.description: milestone: show labels on hover only

signals.name: sN
signals.description: serpentine: number of arcs

signals.name: tC
signals.description: ticks: number of axis ticks to display on the timeline

signals.name: tLO
signals.description: ticks: the offset for the tick labels

signals.name: mO
signals.description: milestone: the offset for the milestone markers

signals.name: sR0P
signals.description: serpentine: percentage of width of canvas for the start of the timeline

signals.name: sLP
signals.description: serpentine: percentage of total length of canvas for the end of the timeline

signals.name: sT
signals.description: serpentine: thicknes of the line

signals.name: domain
signals.description: serpentine: manually set the domain extent for the timeline, otherwise set to null to have the domain calculated for you

signals.name: sRange
signals.description: serpentine: range for the serpentine scale

signals.name: annotations
signals.description: serpentine: annotations that appear at the start and end of the timeline

signals.name: sD
signals.description: serpentine: dash array for the serpentine line

signals.name: reverse
signals.description: serpentine: boolean to indicate whether the scale for the timeline should be reversed

signals.name: sPct
signals.description: serpentine: percentage of width for the straight portions of the timeline

signals.name: sW
signals.description: serpentine: horizontal length of straight segments

signals.name: sL
signals.description: serpentine: total length of line

signals.name: sA
signals.description: serpentine: length of an arc segment

signals.name: sWsA
signals.description: serpentine: length of a line + arc segment

signals.name: sDomain
signals.description: serpentine: domain for the serpentine scale

signals.name: height
signals.description: calculated height

marks.name: axis_group
marks.description: group containing all the axis marks - annotations, domain, arrow indicators, tick lines, tick labels on straightaways, tick labels on arcs

marks.name: annotations
marks.description: Text marks that appear at the start and end of the timeline. Configured using the 'annotations' signal

marks.name: serpentine_line
marks.description: The serpentine-shaped line that acts as the axis domain line

marks.name: arrow_marks
marks.description: The arrows to indicate direction that appear at the beginning and end of each arc+straightaway combonation

marks.name: tick_marks
marks.description: The line (text mark) designated to each tick

marks.name: milestone_connecting_lines
marks.description: The milestone lines that connect the markers to labels

size.signal: labelsOnHover && isValid(hoverFocus) && datum['label'] === hoverFocus['label'] ? (10 + 100 * datum['eventCount']) : (10 + 100 * datum['eventCount'])

marks.name: milestone_label_backgrounds
marks.description: The white backgrounds for milestone labels

values.label: Alocasia acuminata, Alocasia decipiens, Alocasia fallax
Alocasia devansayana, Alocasia lancifolia, Alocasia micholitziana
Alocasia atropurpurea, Alocasia grata, Alocasia lecomtei
Alocasia peltata, Alocasia robusta, Alocasia sarawakensis
Alocasia boa, Alocasia flabellifera, Alocasia monticola, Alocasia nicolsonii, Alocasia pyrospatha

Alocasia balgooyi, Alocasia flemingiana, Alocasia kerinciensis, Alocasia minuscula, Alocasia pangeran, Alocasia principiculus, Alocasia puteri, Alocasia reginula, Alocasia ridleyi, Alocasia suhirmaniana, Alocasia venusta, Alocasia wongii
Alocasia boyceana, Alocasia clypeolata, Alocasia ramosii, Alocasia scalprum
Alocasia chaii, Alocasia infernalis, Alocasia nycteris
Alocasia lihengiae, Alocasia puncakborneensis, Alocasia yunqiana

transform.expr: datum['id'] === 1 ? sDomain[0] : datum['id'] === tC ? sDomain[1] : null

datum['category'] === 'start' ? [sDomain[reverse ? 1 : 0]] : datum['category'] === 'serpentine' ? pluck(data('serpentineDomain'), 'domain') : datum['category'] === 'milestone' ? pluck(data('dataset'), 'domain') : datum['category']==='tick' ? pluck(data('tickDomain'), 'domain') : datum['category'] === 'end' ? [sDomain[reverse ? 0 : 1]] : null
